body_content.explanation: a particular part of a place, piece of land, or country:
examples: All areas of the country will have some rain tonight.
The area of New York to the south of Houston Street is known as Soho.
Houses in the London area (= in and around London) are very expensive.
It can be difficult getting supplies to more remote areas.
He's an area manager (= is responsible for business in a particular area) for a computer company.
This is a very poor area.
Dogs are not allowed in the children's play area.
Do you know of any Thai restaurants in the area?
I went online to check on house prices in the area.

body_content.explanation: a particular part of a surface or object:
examples: This area of the brain has been linked to making decisions.
Click on any blank area of the screen.
We apply the cream gently to any painful areas.

body_content.explanation: a subject or activity, or a part of it:
examples: Software is not really my area of expertise.
She's improved her game in all areas.

body_content.explanation: the size of a flat surface calculated by multiplying its length by its width:
examples: Meadow Farm is 50 square kilometres in area.
